caption:
The photograph captures a serene view of a water surface densely covered with lily pads. The lily pads are largely circular, overlapping each other, and have a deep purplish-green hue. Among these, several vibrant pink water lilies are in bloom, adding a splash of color to the scene. The flowers are partially open, revealing their pale pink petals and yellow centers.

The water is still, with the light creating a gleaming effect on the surface, highlighted by tiny sparkles where sunlight hits the ripples and the wet surfaces of the lily pads. The background is out of focus, suggesting a secluded, natural setting, likely a pond or a calm lake, surrounded by shadows that indicate dense foliage or trees around the water body.

Overall, the image evokes a sense of tranquility and natural beauty, focusing on the details and textures of the lily pads and the delicate appearance of the water lilies.
title: Water lilies on the Wisconsin river at merrill
